structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.text: If any person owns a tract of land that lies in two (2) or more adjoining counties, the processioners of that county in which the greater part lies may procession the whole tract.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2373.
